014package org.jdbi.v3.guice.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017
018import javax.annotation.CheckForNull;
019import javax.inject.Inject;
020import javax.inject.Provider;
021
022import com.google.inject.Injector;
023import com.google.inject.Key;
024import com.google.inject.Scope;
025import com.google.inject.TypeLiteral;
026import com.google.inject.binder.LinkedBindingBuilder;
027import com.google.inject.binder.ScopedBindingBuilder;
028
029import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
030import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
031
032/**
033 * Import binding builder.
034 */
035public final class InternalImportBindingBuilder<T> implements ScopedBindingBuilder {
036
037    private final Key<T> concreteType;
038    private final ScopedBindingBuilder binder;
039    private final InternalBindingProvider<T> provider;
040
041    public InternalImportBindingBuilder(LinkedBindingBuilder<T> binder, Key<T> concreteType) {
042        checkNotNull(binder, "binder is null");
043
044        this.concreteType = checkNotNull(concreteType, "concreteType is null");
045
046        this.provider = new InternalBindingProvider<>(concreteType);
047        this.binder = binder.toProvider(provider);
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * Bind a different type as the given binding. This allows binding e.g. implementations to interface types.
052     */
053    public ScopedBindingBuilder to(Class<? extends T> clazz) {
054        checkNotNull(clazz, "clazz is null");
055
056        this.provider.setKey(concreteType.ofType(clazz));
057
058        return this;
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Bind a different type as the given binding. This allows binding e.g. implementations to interface types.
063     */
064    public ScopedBindingBuilder to(TypeLiteral<? extends T> type) {
065        checkNotNull(type, "type is null");
066
067        this.provider.setKey(concreteType.ofType(type));
068
069        return this;
070    }
071
072    @Override
073    public void in(Class<? extends Annotation> scopeAnnotation) {
074        checkNotNull(scopeAnnotation, "scopeAnnotation is null");
075        this.binder.in(scopeAnnotation);
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public void in(Scope scope) {
080        checkNotNull(scope, "scope is null");
081        this.binder.in(scope);
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public void asEagerSingleton() {
086        this.binder.asEagerSingleton();
087    }
088
089    static final class InternalBindingProvider<T> implements Provider<T> {
090
091        private Key<? extends T> key;
092        private Injector injector;
093
094        InternalBindingProvider(Key<? extends T> key) {
095            this.key = checkNotNull(key, "key is null");
096        }
097
098        InternalBindingProvider<T> setKey(Key<? extends T> key) {
099            this.key = checkNotNull(key, "key is null");
100            return this;
101        }
102
103        @Inject
104        void setInjector(final Injector injector) {
105            checkNotNull(injector, "injector is null");
106            checkState(this.injector == null, "setInjector() called multiple times!");
107
108            this.injector = injector;
109        }
110
111        @Override
112        @CheckForNull
113        public T get() {
114            checkState(this.injector != null, "calling get() before setInjector()!");
115            return injector.getInstance(key);
116        }
117    }
118}
